context: Do you have any interesting details about Jan de Bont?
Jan De Bont starred in Lethal Weapon 3 and in The Haunting. Liam Neeson was in the second one, too.
I think the Haunting is written by Shirley Jackson and Nelson Gidding if I remember right.
You're correct. It also starred Virginia Madsen and is a suspense movie. Do you enjoy that genre?
I remember Lili Taylor and Lois Maxwell co-starred in The Haunting, right?
resp: Yes, Taylor was also in a movie called The Notorious Bettie Page that you might enjoy.
